title: JSX
description: JSX allows you to write HTML inside JavaScript. It's the syntax used in React components.
details: It makes writing UI components more intuitive.
JSX must return a single parent element.

title: Components
description: Components are reusable UI blocks in React.
details: Components can be functional or class-based.
Props are used to pass data between components.
Components improve code reusability and readability.

title: Software Engineering
description: Hooks let you use state and lifecycle in functional components.
